CustomField.description: Id of the object that defines the relationship type. For the Vlocity Party Model, this is the Id of a PartyRelationshipType__c object. Required if Relationship Type Field is defined.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Id of the object that defines the relationship type. For the Vlocity Party Model, this is the Id of a PartyRelationshipType__c object. Required if Relationship Type Field is defined.
CustomField.label: Relationship Type Value
